itemDetails.comment: Since 5.3, they will be affected by gravity.
Since 5.1 if health is full, shield will be granted instead.
4.1% of chance to get one on each location.
When activated, you are teleported into the sky and placed in skydiving mode.
Applies icy feet to friends or foes, causing them to slide around with low friction.
Become invisible to enemies, increasing your speed, and allowing the ability to perform double jumps.
Create a safe zone inside a storm, or a storm zone where the tempest is not there.
Create a safe zone inside a storm, or a storm zone where the tempest is not there.
20 missiles will rain down on the surrounding area that damage and destroy any nearby players or structures.
